channel.title: dagger on SoByte
channel.description: Recent content in dagger on SoByte

item.title: Getting started with Dagger
item.description: Recently, Docker founder Solomon Hykes announced the launch of a new product Dagger, a new DevOps platform designed to solve some of the problems in the DevOps process for developers. Dagger has raised $20 million in Series A funding led by Redpoint Ventures, with participation from Nat Fireman, former CEO of GitHub, Brian Stevens, former CTO of Red Hat, and Ellan Pao, former CEO of Reddit. Dagger wants to help
